TEXT.TITLE: TDK GROUP NET UP 17.6 PCT IN NINE MONTHS
TEXT.BODY: Nine months ended August 31 Group shr 118.66 yen vs 100.89 yen Group shr per ADS 237.32 vs 201.78 Net 14.28 billion vs 12.14 billion Pretax 34.48 billion vs 29.45 billion Sales 288.08 billion vs 278.50 billion Company's full name is TDK Corp <TDK.T>. REUTER
